title: 30 Seconds
description: *30 Seconds is a novella.*When Officer Blake Herro agreed to go undercover in the Mob, he thought he understood the risks. But he's made mistakes and now an innocent woman has become their target. He's determined to protect her at all costs.The Mob's death threat turns Dr. Dani Hart's life upside down, but there is one danger she doesnâ€™t anticipate. As she's dodging bullets, she's falling in love with Blake. With danger all around them, will she and Blake survive and have a happy ending, or will the Mob make good on their threat?Content Warning: on page sex, strong language, violence, guns
author: Chrys Fey
